ml_tags: Neville "Mally" Anderson Born 03/07/1937, entered into eternal life 01/11/1999 Beloved father of Glenda, Kathleen, Darryl, Lawrence, Paula, Helen, Charmaine, Neville, Ruby, Stephen and Amelia. A loving Grandfather and Great Grandfather to many. Nola Brown Born 06/6/1943 entered into eternal life 23/02/2021 Beloved mother of Glenda, Kathleen, Darryl, Lawrence, Paula, Helen, Charmaine, Neville, Ruby, Stephen and Amelia. A loving Grandmother and Great Grandmother to many. My Parents Kept A Garden Our Parents kept a Garden. A garden of the heart; They planted all the good things, That gave our lives a start They turned us to the sunshine, And encouraged us to dream: Fostering and nurturing seeds of self-esteem. And when the winds and rain came, They protected us enough; But not too much because they knew We would stand up strong and tough.
